name: royal_matches
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool trackmania.
Tool description: Get Stats, Matches and Leaderboards from Trackmania (Unofficial).
API description: Fetch recent royal matches from the Trackmania API.

page.description: The page number of the results to fetch, where each page contains a defined number of results. The default is `0`.

limit.description: The maximum number of results to return. The default is `50`.
